roleset.name: small scale agglutination of red blood cells
roleset.note: MICROHEMAGGLUTINATION-N NOTES: Relation to hemagglutination.01. (from microhemagglutination.01-n)

role.descr: Agglutinated entity, explicit mention of red blood cells

example.name: microhemagglutination-n
example.text: Microhemagglutination of guinea pig erythocytes cells has been described (11).
